pages.text: Alchemical purification is based on the theory that $(bold)like attracts like$(). The example of ore purification illustrates this well: When placing ore in a cauldron that contains $(thing)Terra Essentia$() the stone intermixed with the ore is bound to the Essentia and dissolved while the metal remains, $(bold)leading to higher yields$().

To $(bold)purify$() items in the cauldron, stir with a stick by right-clicking the boiling cauldron. Stir multiple times to increase the time you can drop in items. Crafting will only work while colorful bubbles show.

pages.title: But wait, there's more!
pages.text: To find further (modded) purification recipes, use JEI to check for all uses of the $(thing)Crucible$().
